snippet: Social media has made inroads into shaping moviegoers' choices at the multiplex, but a new poll finds that an overwhelming majority of moviegoers still count on movie reviews....

headline.print_headline: Nielsen Poll: Film Reviews Still Influential
headline.main: Nielsen Poll: Film Reviews Still Influential

lead_paragraph: Social media has made inroads into shaping moviegoers' choices at the multiplex, but a new poll finds that an overwhelming majority of moviegoers still count on movie reviews.
